[ library(daVinci) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

daVinci_draw_graph(+Graph)

Draw a graph in lib(graph_algorithms) format
Graph
a graph description

Description

This predicate takes a graph in the format defined by the library lib(graph_algorithms), and draws it.

Examples

:- lib(graph_algorithms).
:- lib(daVinci).

top :-
	make_random_graph(10,20,true,true,true,Graph),
	daVinci_draw_graph(Graph).
